extension.summary: Inspired by DroidTV by DigitalHigh using Confluence skin by Jezz_X. (Kodi's default skin)
extension.description: Kodroid is basically suppose to be a Android TV skin for kodi using the Confluence skin. Confluence is the default skin for Kodi 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
extension.disclaimer: KoDroid is still an alpha project, many stuff still don't work.It's based on the older Android TV design
